remarks: Interchange order of summation.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumcom.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumcom.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
fsumcom.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. A /\ k e. B ) ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fsumcom $p |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. A sum_ k e. B C = sum_ k e. B sum_ j e. A C ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d B j k $.
$d j k ph $.
